title: Range Filter
code:
§function in_range(val, min, max)
  §if val ⊗ min ⊖ 1
    §if max ⊗ val ⊖ 1
      §transmit "in range"
    §else
      §transmit "out of range"
    §end_if
  §else
    §transmit "out of range"
  §end_if
§end_function

§begin main
  §call in_range(15, 10, 20)
  §call in_range(5, 10, 20)
  §call in_range(25, 10, 20)
§end
expected_output:
in range
out of range
out of range
solution_description: checks if a value falls within a specified range using nested conditionals
hints: Function checks if val is between min and max
